GSP33brssbh1u:2177: idaṃ hi kartṛtvaṃ bhoktṛtvaṃ ta sattvakṣetrajñayoritaretisvabhāvāvivekakṛtaṃ kalpyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:2178: paramārthatastu nānyatarasyāpi saṃbhavati, acetanatvātsattvasya, avikriyatvācca kṣetrajñasya /
GSP33brssbh1u:2180: tathāca śrutiḥ- 'yatra vā anyadiva syāttatrānyo 'nyatpaśyet' ityādinā svapnadṛṣṭahastyādivyavahāravadavidyāviṣaya eva kartṛtvādivyavahāraṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2187: tata eva gūḍhamanupraviṣṭaṃ gahanatāṃ gatamīśvaram adhyātmaprayogaḥ pratyagātmanyeva cittasamādhānaṃ tenādhigamo mahāvākyajā vṛttistayā viditvetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2190: juṣṭaṃ dhyānādinā sevitaṃ yadā dhyānaparipākadaśāyāmīśamanyaṃ viśiṣṭarūpādbhinnaṃ pasyati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2194: anyadivābhāsabhūtaṃ nānātvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ syāttatra avidyakabuddhyādisaṃbandhādanyo bhūtvānyacakṣuṣā paśyet /
GSP33brssbh1u:2200: 'ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyata eṣa ātmeti hovācaitadamṛtamabhayametadbrahmeti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2201: etadyapyasminsarpirvodakaṃ vā siñcati vartmani eva gacchati' (chā. 4.15.1) ityādi śra8yate /
GSP33brssbh1u:2202: tatra saṃśayaḥ kimayaṃ pratibimbātmakṣyadhikaraṇo nirdiśyate 'thavā vijñānātmā uta devatātmendriyasyādhiṣṭhātāthaveśvara iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2205: 'ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyate' iti ca prasiddavadupadeśāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:2207: sa hi cakṣuṣā rūpaṃ paśyaṃścakṣuṣi saṃnihito bhavati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2222: 'tadyadyapyasminsarpirvodakaṃ vā siñcati vartmani eva gacchati' iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2224: 'etaṃ saṃyaddhāma ityācakṣate etaṃ hi sarvāṇi vāmānyabhisaṃyanti' /
GSP33brssbh1u:2225: 'eṣa u eva vāmanīreṣa hi sarvāṇi vāmāni nayati' /
GSP33brssbh1u:2226: ' eṣa u eva bhāmānīreṣa hi sarveṣu lokeṣu bhāti' (chā. 4.15.2,3,4) iti ca /
GSP33brssbh1u:2239: atrocyate- bhavedeṣānavakḷptiḥ, yadyetadevaikaṃ sthānamasya nirdiṣṭaṃ bhavet /
GSP33brssbh1u:2240: santi hyanyānyapi pṛthivyādīni sthānānyasya nirdiṣṭāni- 'yaḥ pṛthivyāṃ tiṣṭhan' (bṛ. 3.7.3) ityādinā /
GSP33brssbh1u:2241: teṣu hi cakṣurapi nirdiṣṭam- 'yaścakṣuṣi tiṣṭhan' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2242: 'sthānādivyapadeśāt' ityādigrahaṇenaitaddarśayati- na kevalaṃ sthānamevaikamanucitaṃ brahmaṇo nirdiśyamānaṃ dṛśyate,
GSP33brssbh1u:2243: kiṃ tarhi nāmarūpamityevañjātīyakamapyanāmarūpasya brahmaṇo 'nucitaṃ nirdiśyamānaṃ dṛśyate- 'tasyoditi nāma' 'hiraṇyaśmaśruḥ' (chā. 1.6.7,6) ityādi /
GSP33brssbh1u:2244: nirguṇamapi sadbrahma nāmarūpagatairguṇaiḥ saguṇamupāsanārthaṃ tatra tatropadiśyata ityetadapyuktameva /
GSP33brssbh1u:2245: sarvagatasyāpi brahmaṇa upalabdhyarthaṃ sthānaviśeṣo na virudhyate,
GSP33brssbh1u:2249: sthānādanyādayo yeṣāṃ te sthānādayo nāmarūpaprakārāsteṣāṃ vyapadeśātsarvaṅgatasyaikasthānaniyamo nāvakalpate /
GSP33brssbh1u:2252: apica naivātra vivaditavyaṃ, kiṃ brahmāsminvākye 'bhidhīyate na veti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2254: sukhaviśiṣṭaṃ hi brahma yadvākyopakrame prakrāntaṃ 'prāṇo brahma kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahma' iti tadevehābhihitaṃ,
GSP33brssbh1u:2256: 'ācāryastu te gatiṃ vaktā' (chā. 4 14.1) iti ca gatimātrābhidhānapratijñānāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:2257: kathaṃ punarvākyopakrame sukhaviśiṣṭaṃ brahma vijñāyata iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2258: ucyate- 'prāṇo brahma kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahma' ityetadagnīnāṃ vacanaṃ śrutvopakosala uvāca- 'vijānāmyahaṃ yatprāṇo brahma kaṃ ca tu khaṃ ca na vijānāmi' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2259: tatredaṃ prativacanam- 'yadvāva kaṃ tadeva khaṃ yadeva khaṃ tadeva kaṃ' (chā. 4.10.5)
GSP33brssbh1u:2262: yadi tasya viśeṣaṇatvena kaṃśabdaḥ sukhavācī nopādīyeta /
GSP33brssbh1u:2263: tathā sati kevale bhūtākāśe brahmaśabdo nāmādiṣviva pratīkābhiprāyeṇa prayukta iti pratītiḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:2264: tathā kaṃśabdasya viṣayendriyasaṃparkajanite sāmaye sukhe prasiddhatvāt,
GSP33brssbh1u:2267: itaretaraviśeṣatau tu kaṅkhaṃśabdau sukhātmakaṃ brahma gamayataḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2268: tatra dvitīye brahmaśabde 'nupādīyamāne kaṃ khaṃ brahmetyevocyamāne kaṃśabdasya viśeṣaṇatvenaivopayuktatvātasukhasya guṇasyādhyeyatvaṃ syāt,
GSP33brssbh1u:2269: tanmā bhūdityubhayoḥ kaṅkhaṃśabdayorbrahmaśabdaśirastvaṃ 'kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahma' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2272: pratyekaṃ ca gārhapatyādayo 'gnayaḥ svaṃ svaṃ mahimānamupadiśya 'eṣā somya te 'smadvidyātmavidyā ca' ityupasaṃharantaḥ pūrvatra brahma nirdiṣṭamiti jñāpayanti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2273: 'ācāryastu te gatiṃ vaktā' iti ca gatimātrābhidhānapratijñānamarthāntaravivakṣāṃ vārayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2274: 'yathā puṣkarapalāśā āpo na śliṣyanta evamevaṃvidi pāpaṃ karma na śliṣyate' (chā. 4.14.3)
GSP33brssbh1u:2275: iti cākṣisthānaṃ puruṣaṃ vijānataḥ pāpenānupaghātaṃ bruvannakṣisthānasya puruṣasya brahmatvaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2276_1: tadvido gatiṃ vakṣyāmītyupakramate- 'ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyata eṣa ātmeti hovāca'
GSP33brssbh1u:2282: brahmapadaṃ śiro yayoste brahmaśirasī tayorbhāvo brahmaśirastvam /
GSP33brssbh1u:2286_0: yasmācchrutopaniṣatkasya śrutarahasyavijñānasya brahmavido yā gatirdevayānākhyā prasiddhā
GSP33brssbh1u:2288: tatra prayātā gacchanti brahma brahmavido janāḥ' (gī. 8.24) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2290_0: 'atha yadu caivāsmiñchavyaṃ kurvanti yadi ca nārciṣamevābhisaṃbhavanti' ityupakramya
GSP33brssbh1u:2290_1: 'ādityāccandramasaṃ candramaso vidyutaṃ tatpuruṣo 'mānavaḥ sa enānbrahma gamayatyeva
GSP33brssbh1u:2290_2: devapatho brahmapatha etena pratipadyamānā imaṃ mānavamāvarte nāvartante' (chā. 4.17.5) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2291: tadiha brahmavidviṣayā prasiddhayā gatyākṣisthānasya brahmatvaṃ niścīyate // 16 //
GSP33brssbh1u:2295: asminnupāsake mṛte putrādayaḥ śavyaṃ śavasaṃbandhi saṃskārādikarma kurvanti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2299: yatpunaruktaṃ chāyātmā, vijñānātmā, devatātmā vā syādakṣisthāna iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2303: yadaiva hi kaścitpuruṣaścakṣurāsīdati tadā cakṣuṣi puruṣacchāyā dṛśyate, apagate tasminna dṛśyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:2304: 'ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣaḥ' iti ca śrutiḥ saṃnidhānātsvacakṣuṣi dṛśyamānaṃ puruṣamupāsyatvenopadiśati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2305: nacopāsanākāle chāyākaraṃ kañcitpuruṣaṃ cakṣuḥsamīpe saṃnidhāpyopāsta iti yuktaṃ kalpayitum /
GSP33brssbh1u:2308: asaṃbhavācca tasminnamṛtatvādīnāṃ guṇānāṃ na chāyātmani pratītiḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2309: tathā vijñānātmano 'pi sādhāraṇe kṛtsnaśarīrendriyasaṃbandhe sati cakṣuṣyevāvasthitatvaṃ vaktuṃ na śakyam /
GSP33brssbh1u:2315: devatātmanastu 'raśmibhireṣo 'sminpratiṣṭhitaḥ' iti śruteryadyapi cakṣuṣyavasthānaṃ syāttathāpyātmatvaṃ tāvanna saṃbhavati, parāgrūpatvāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:2322: asmiṃśca pakṣe dṛśyata iti prasiddhavadupādānaṃ śāstrādyapekṣaṃ vidvadviṣayaṃ prarocanārthamiti vyākhyeyam // 17 //
GSP33brssbh1u:2326: bhīṣā bhayena, asmāt brahmaṇaḥ, pavate calati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2327: uktāpekṣayā pañcamo mṛtyuḥ samāptāyuṣāṃ nikaṭe dhāvatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2331_0: 'ya imaṃ ca lokaṃ paraṃ ca lokaṃ sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni yo 'ntaro yamayati' ityupakramya
GSP33brssbh1u:2331_1: śrūyate- 'yaḥ pṛthivyāṃ tiṣṭhanpṛthivyā antaro yaṃ pṛthivī na veda yasya pṛthivī
GSP33brssbh1u:2331_2: śarīraṃ yaḥ pṛthivīmantaro yamayatyeṣa ta ātmāntaryāmyamṛtaḥ' (bṛha. 3.7.1,2) ityādi /
GSP33brssbh1u:2333: sa kimadhidaivādyabhimānī devatātmā kaścitkiṃvā prāptāṇimādyaiśvaryaḥ kaścidyogī kiṃvā paramātmā kiṃvārthāntaraṃ kiñcidityapūrvasaṃjñādarśanātmasaṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2339: tathāca śrūyate- 'pṛthivyeva yasyāyatanamagnirloko mano jyotiḥ' (bṛ. 3.9.10) ityādi /
GSP33brssbh1u:2341: yogino vā kasyacitsiddhasya sarvānupraveśena yamayitṛtvaṃ syāt,
GSP33brssbh1u:2343: akāryakaraṇatvādityevaṃ prāpta idamucyate- yo 'ntaryāmyadhidaivādiṣu śrūyate sa paramātmaiva syānnānya iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2345: tasya hi paramātmano dharmā iha nirdiśyamānā dṛśyante /
GSP33brssbh1u:2346: pṛthivyādi tāvadadhidaivatādibhedabhinnaṃ samastaṃ vikārajātamantastiṣṭanyamayatīti paramātmano yamayitṛtvaṃ dharma upapadyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:2348: eṣa ta 'ātmāntaryāmyamṛtaḥ' iti cātmatvāmṛtatve mukhye paramātmana upapadyete /
GSP33brssbh1u:2349: 'yaṃ pṛthivī na veda' iti ca pṛthivīdevatāyā avijñeyamantaryāmiṇaṃ bruvandevatātmano 'nyamantaryāmiṇaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2359: FN: āyatanaṃ śarīraṃ, lokyate 'neneti lokacakṣuḥ, jyotirmanaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2366: iti hi smaranti, tasyāpi niyantṛtvaṃ sarvavikārakāraṇatvādupapadyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:2370: ata uttaramucyate- naca smārte pradhānamantaryāmiśabdaṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2372: yadyapyadṛṣṭatvādivyapadeśaḥ pradhānasyasaṃbhavati tathāpi na draṣṭṛtvādivyapeśaḥ saṃbhavati,
GSP33brssbh1u:2374: 'adṛṣṭo draṣṭāśrutaḥ śrotāmato mantāvijñāto vijñātā' (bṛha. 3.7.23) iti hi vākyaśeṣa iha bhavati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2378: śārīro hi cetanatvāddraṣṭā śrotā mantā vijñātā ca bhavati, ātmā ca pratyaktvāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:2380: adṛṣṭatvādayaśca dharmāḥ śārīre parasiddhāḥ darśanādikriyāyāḥ kartari pravṛttivirodhāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:2390: śarīraś cobhaye 'pi hi bhedenainam adhīyate | BBs_1,2.20 |
GSP33brssbh1u:2394: yadyapi draṣṭṛtvādayo dharmastasya saṃbhavanti tathāpi ghaṭākāśavadupādhiparicchinnatvānna kārtsyena pṛthivyādiṣvantaravasthātuṃ niyantuṃ ca śaknoti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2395: apicobhaye 'pi hi śākhinaḥ kāṇvā mādhyandinānāścāntaryāmiṇo bhedenainaṃ śārīraṃ pṛthivyādivadadhiṣṭhānatvena niyamyatvena cādhīyate- 'yo vijñāne tiṣṭhan' (bṛ. 3.7.22) iti kāṇvāḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2397: 'ya ātmani tiṣṭhan' ityasminstāvatpāṭhe bhavatyātmaśabdaḥ śārīrasya vācakaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2398: 'yo vijñāne tiṣṭhan' ityasminnapi pāṭhe vijñānaśabdena śārīra ucyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:2401: kathaṃ punarekasmindehe dvau draṣṭāravupapadyete, yaścāyamīśvaro 'ntaryāmī yaścāyamitaraḥ śārīraḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2404: atra hi prakṛtādantaryāmiṇo 'nyaṃ draṣṭāraṃ, śrotāraṃ, mantāraṃ, vijñātāraṃ cātmānaṃ pratiṣedhati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2408: eko hi pratyagātmā bhavati, na dvau pratyagātmānau saṃbhavataḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2409: ekasyaiva tu bhedavyavahāra upādhikṛto yathā ghaṭākāśo mahākāśa iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2410: tataśca jñātṛjñeyādibhedaśrutayaḥ pratyakṣādīni ca pramāṇāni saṃsārānubhavo vidhipratiṣedhaśāstraṃ ceti sarvametadupapadyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:2411: tathāca śrutiḥ 'yatra hi dvaitamiva bhavati taditara itaraṃ paśyati' itvavidyāviṣaye sarve vyavahāraṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2412: 'yatra tvasya sarvamātmaivābhūttatkena kaṃ paśyet' iti vidyāviṣaye sarve vyavahāraṃ vārayati // 20 //
GSP33brssbh1u:2417: 'yattadadreśyamagrāhyamagotramavarṇamacakṣuḥśrotraṃ tadapāṇipādaṃ nityaṃ vibhuṃ sarvagataṃ susūkṣmaṃ tadavyayaṃ yadbhūtayoniṃ paripaśyanti dhīrāḥ' (muṇḍa. 1.1.5,6) iti śrūyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:2418: tatra saṃśayaḥ- kimayamadreśyatvādiguṇako bhūtayoniḥ pradhānaṃ syāduta śārīra āhosvitparameśvara iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2419: tatra pradhānamacetanaṃ bhūtayoniriti yuktaṃ, acetanānāmeva taddṛṣṭāntatvenopādānāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:2420: 'yathorṇanābhiḥ sṛjate gṛhyate ca yathā pṛthivyāmoṣadhaḥ saṃbhavanti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2421: yathā sataḥ puruṣotkeśalomāni tathākṣarātsaṃbhavatīha viśvam' (muṇḍa. 1.1.7) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2424: nahi kevalasya cetanasya tatra sūtrayonitvaṃ keśalomayonitvaṃ cāsti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2431: ityayaṃ vākyaśeṣo 'cetane pradhāne na saṃbhavanti, kathaṃ pradhānaṃ bhūtayoniḥ pratijñāyata iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2432: atrocyate- 'yayā tadakṣaramadhigamyate' 'yattadadreśyam' ityakṣaraśabdenādṛśyatvādiguṇakaṃ bhūtayoniṃ śrāvayitvā punarante śrāvayiṣyati- 'akṣarātparataḥ paraḥ' (muṇḍa. 2.1.2) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2433: tatra yaḥ paro 'kṣarācchrutaḥ sa sarvajñaḥ sarvavitsaṃbhaviṣyati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2435: yadā tu yoniśabdo nimittavācī tadā śārīro 'pi bhūtayoniḥ syāt,
GSP33brssbh1u:2437: evaṃ prāpte 'bhidhīyate- yoyamadṛśyatvādiguṇako bhūtayoniḥ sa parameśvara eva syānnānya iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2440: parameśvarasya hi dharma ihocyamāno dṛśyate- 'yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvavit' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2441: nahi pradhānasyācetanasya śārīrasya vopādhiparicchinnadṛṣṭeḥ sarvajñatvaṃ sarvavittvaṃ vā saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2442: nanvakṣaraśabdanirdiṣṭādbhūtayoneḥ parasyaiva tatsarvajñatvaṃ ca na bhūtayoniviṣayamityuktam /
GSP33brssbh1u:2444_0: yatkāraṇaṃ 'akṣarātsaṃbhavatīha viśvam' iti prakṛtaṃ bhūtayonimiha jāyamānaprakṛtitvena
GSP33brssbh1u:2444_1: nirdiśyānantaramapi jāyamānaprakṛtitvenaiva sarvajñaṃ nirdiśati- 'yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvavidyasya jñānamayaṃ tapaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2445: tasmādetadbrahma nāma rūpamannaṃ ca jāyate' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2446: tasmānnirdeśasāmyena pratyabhijñāyamānatvātprakṛtasyaivākṣarasya bhūtayoneḥ sarvajñatvaṃ sarvavittvaṃ ca dharma ucyata iti gamyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:2449: 'yenākṣaraṃ puruṣaṃ veda satyaṃ provāca tāṃ tattvato brahmavidyām' (muṇḍa. 1.2.13)
GSP33brssbh1u:2450: iti prakṛtya tasyaivākṣarasya bhūtayoneradṛśyatvādiguṇakasya vaktavyatvena pratijñātatvāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:2451: kathaṃ tarhi 'akṣarātparataḥ paraḥ' iti vyapadiśyata iti, uttarasūtre tadvakṣyāmaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2452: apicātra dve vidye veditavye ukte- 'parā caivāparā ca' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2453: tatrāparāmṛgvedādilakṣaṇāṃ vidyāmuktvā bravīti- 'atha parā yayā tadakṣaramadhigamyate ityādi /
GSP33brssbh1u:2455: yadi punaḥ parameśvarādanyadadṛśyatvādiguṇakamakṣaraṃ parikalpyeta neyaṃ parā vidyā syāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:2458: tisraśca vidyāḥ pratijñāyeran, tvatpakṣe 'kṣarādbhūtayoneḥ parasya paramātmanaḥ pratipādyamānatvāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:2459: dve eva tu vidye veditavye iha nirdiṣṭe /
GSP33brssbh1u:2461: iti caikavijñānena sarvavijñānāpekṣaṇaṃ sarvātmake brahmaṇi vivakṣyamāṇe 'vakalpyate,

GSP33brssbh1u:2791: vikārānṛtābhisaṃdhasya cāpavādaḥ śrūyate- 'mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyumāpnoti ya iha nāneva paśyati' (kā. 2.4.11) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2792: sarvaṃ brahmeti tu sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ prapañcapravilāpanārthaṃ nānekarasatāpratipādanārtham /
GSP33brssbh1u:2793: 'sa yathā saindhavaghano 'nantaro 'bāhyaḥ kṛtsno rasaghana evaivaṃ vā are 'yamātmānantaro 'bāhyaḥ kṛtsnaḥ prajñānaghana eva' (bṛha. 4.5.13)
GSP33brssbh1u:2798: atrocyate- vidhāraṇatvamātramatra setuśrutyā vivakṣyate na pāravattvādi /
GSP33brssbh1u:2799: nahi mṛddārumayo loke seturdṛṣṭa ityatrāpi mṛddārumaya evaseturabhyupagamyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:2800: setuśabdārtho 'pi vidhāraṇatvamātrameva na pāravattvādi ṣiño bandhanakarmaṇaḥ setuśabdavyutpatteḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2801: apara āha- 'tamevaikaṃ jānatha ātmānam' iti yadetatsaṃkīrtitamātmajñānaṃ,
GSP33brssbh1u:2804: 'amṛtasyaiṣa setuḥ' iti setuśrutyā saṃkīrtyate na tu dyubhvādyāyatanam /
GSP33brssbh1u:2807: FN: amṛtasyeti śravaṇāt seturiti śravaṇāditi yojanā /
GSP33brssbh1u:2820: tatastatpūjanādau rāgastatparibhavādau dveṣastaducchedadarśanādbhayaṃ mohaścetyevamayamanantabhedo 'narthavrātaḥ saṃtataḥ sarveṣāṃ naḥ pratyakṣaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2824: ityuktvā bravīti- 'tathā vidvānnāmarūpādvimuktaḥ parātparaṃ puruṣamupaiti divyam' (muṇḍa. 3.2.7) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2825: brahmaṇaśca muktopasṛpyatvaṃ prasiddhaṃ śāstre- 'yadā sarve pramucyante kāmā ye 'sya hṛdi śritāḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2826: atha martyo 'mṛto bhavatyatra brahma samaśnute' (bṛha. 4.4.7) ityevamādau /
GSP33brssbh1u:2828: apica 'tamevaikaṃ jānatha ātmānamanyā vāco vimuñcathāmṛtasyaiva setuḥ' iti vāgvimokapūrvakaṃ vijñeyatvamiha dyubhvādyāyatanasyocyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:2829: tacca śrutyantare brahmaṇo dṛṣṭam- 'tameva dhīro vijñāya prajñāṃ kurvati brāhmaṇaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2837: yathā brahmaṇaḥ pratipādakaḥ vaiśeṣiko heturukto naivamarthāntarasya vaiśeṣiko hetuḥ pratipādako 'stītyāha /
GSP33brssbh1u:2840: tasyācetanasya pradhānasya pratipādakaḥ śabdastacchabdaḥ, na tacchabdo 'tacchabdaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2843: tadviparītasya cetanasya pratipādakaśabdo 'trāsti- 'yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvavit' (muṇḍa.1.1.9) ityādiḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2847_0: yadyapi prāṇabhṛto vijñānātmana ātmatvaṃ cetanatvaṃ ca saṃbhavati tathāpyupādhiparicchinnajñānasya
GSP33brssbh1u:2853: bhedavyapadeśaśceha bhavati- 'tamevaikaṃ jānatha ātmānam' iti jñeyajñātṛbhāvena /
GSP33brssbh1u:2863: paramātmani hi sarvātmake vijñāte sarvamidaṃ vijñātaṃ syānna kevale prāṇabhṛti // 6 //
GSP33brssbh1u:2867: dyubhvādyāyatanaṃ ca prakṛtya 'dvā supraṇā sayujā sakhāyā' (mu. 3.1.1)
GSP33brssbh1u:2872: yadi ceśvaro dyubhvādyāyatanatvena vivakṣitastatastasya prakṛtasyeśvarasya kṣetrajñātpṛthagvacanamavakalpate /
GSP33brssbh1u:2877: kṣetrajñau hi kartṛtvena bhoktṛtvena ca pratiśarīraṃ buddhyādyupādhisaṃbaddho lokata eva prasijaddho nāsau śrutyā tātparyeṇa vivakṣyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:2878: īśvarastu lokato 'prasiddhatvācchrutyā tātparyeṇa vivakṣyata iti na tasyākasmikaṃ vacanaṃ yuktam /
GSP33brssbh1u:2879: 'guhāṃ praviṣṭāvātmānau hi' ityatrāpyetaddarśitaṃ 'dvā suparṇā' ityasyāmṛcīśvarakṣetrajñāvucyete iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2880: yadāpi paiṅgyupaniṣatkṛtena vyākhyānenāsyāmṛci sattvakṣetrajñāvucyete tadāpi na virodhaḥ kaścit /
GSP33brssbh1u:2882: prāṇabhṛddhīha ghaṭādicchidravatsattvādyupādhyabhimānitvena pratiśarīraṃ gṛhyamāṇo dyubhvādyāyatanaṃ na bhavatīti niṣidhyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:2885: yathā ghaṭādicchidrāṇi ghaṭādibhirupādhibhirvinopalakṣyamāṇāni mahākāśa eva bhavanti,
GSP33brssbh1u:2890: tasyaiva hi bhūtayonivākyasya madhya idaṃ paṭhitam 'yasmindyauḥ pṛthivī cāntarikṣam' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2895: idaṃ samāmananti- 'bhūmā tveva vidijñāsitavya iti bhūmānaṃ bhagavo vijijñāsa iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2896: yatra nānyatpaśyati nānyacchṛṇoti nānyadvijānāti sa bhūmātha yatrānyatpaśyatyanyacchṛṇotyanyadvijānāti tadalpam' (chā. 7.23,24) ityādi /
GSP33brssbh1u:2902: tathā 'śrutaṃ hyeva me bhagavaddṛśebhyastarati śokamātmaviditi so 'haṃ bhagavaḥ śocāmi taṃ mā bhagavāñśokasya pāraṃ tārayatu' (chāṃ. 7.1.3)
GSP33brssbh1u:2904: tatra kasyopādanaṃ nyāyyaṃ kasya vā hānamiti bhavati saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2909: yathā hi 'asti bhagavo nāmno bhūyaḥ' iti, 'vāgvāva nāmno bhūyasī' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2911: mano vāva vāco bhūyaḥ' iti ca nāmādibhyo hyā prāṇādbhūyaḥpraśnaprativacanapravāhaḥ pravṛttaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2912: naivaṃ prāṇātparaṃ bhūyaḥpraśnaprativacanaṃ dṛśyate 'sti bhagavaḥ prāṇādbhūya ityādo vāva prāṇādbhūya iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2913_0: prāṇameva tu nāmādibhya āśāntebhyo bhūyāsaṃ 'prāṇo vā āśāyā bhūyān' ityādinā saprapañcamuktvā
GSP33brssbh1u:2913_2: 'eṣa tu vā ativadati yaḥ satyenātivadati' iti prāṇavratamativāditvamanukṛṣyāparityajyaiva
GSP33brssbh1u:2913_3: prāṇaṃ satyādiparamparayā bhūmānamavatārayanprāṇameva bhūmānaṃ manyanta iti gamyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:2914: kathaṃ punaḥ prāṇe bhūmani vyākhyāyamāne 'yatra nānyatpaśyati' ityetadbhūmno lakṣaṇaparaṃ vacanaṃ vyākhyāyeteti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2915: ucyate- suṣuptyavasthāyāṃ prāṇagrasteṣu karaṇeṣu darśanādivyavahāranivṛttidarśanātsaṃbhavati prāṇasyāpi 'yatra nānyatpaśyati' ityetallakṣaṇam /
GSP33brssbh1u:2916: tathāca śrutiḥ 'na śṛṇoti na paśyati' ityādinā sarvakaraṇavyāpārapratyastamayarūpāṃ suṣuptyavasthāmuktvā 'prāṇāgnaya evaitasminpure jāgrati' (pra. 4.2.3)
GSP33brssbh1u:2917: iti tasyāmevāvasthāyāṃ pañcavṛtteḥ prāṇasya jāgaraṇaṃ bruvatī prāṇapradhānāṃ suṣuptyavasthāṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2918: yaccaitadbhūmnaḥ sukhatvaṃ śrutam- 'yo vai bhūmā tatsukham' (chā. 7.23) iti, tadapyaviruddham /
GSP33brssbh1u:2919: 'atraiṣa devaḥ svapnānna paśyatyatha yadetasmiñśarīre sukhaṃ bhavati' (pra. 4.6)
GSP33brssbh1u:2922: iti tadapi prāṇasyāviruddhaṃ, 'prāṇo vā amṛtam' (kau. 3.2) iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2923: kathaṃ punaḥ prāṇaṃ bhūmānaṃ manyamānasya tarati śokamātmavit ityātmavividiṣayā prakaraṇasyotthānamupapadyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:2925: tathāhi-' prāṇo ha pitā prāṇo mātā prāṇo bhrātā prāṇaḥ svasā prāṇa ācāryaḥ prāṇo brāhmaṇaḥ' (chā. 7.15.1)
GSP33brssbh1u:2927: 'yathā vā arā nābhau samarpitā evamasminprāṇe sarvaṃ samarpitam' iti ca sarvātmatvāranābhinidarśanābhyāṃ ca saṃbhavati vaipulyātmikā bhūmarūpatā prāṇasya /
GSP33brssbh1u:2929: tata idamucyate- paramātmaiveha bhūmā bhavitumarhati na prāṇaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2932: saṃprasāda iti suṣuptaṃ sthānamucyate, samyakprasīdatyasminniti nirvacanāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:2933: bṛhadāraṇyake ca svapnajāgaritasthānābhyāṃ saha pāṭhāt tasyāṃ ca saṃprasādāvasthāyāṃ prāṇo jāgartīti prāṇo 'tra saṃprasādo 'bhipreyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:2936: nahi nāmaiva nāmno bhūya iti nāmna ūrdhvamupadiṣṭam /
GSP33brssbh1u:2937: kiṃ tarhi nāmno 'nyadarthāntaramupadiṣṭaṃ vāgākhyam- 'vāgvāva nāmno bhūyasī' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2940: nanviha nāsti praśno 'sti bhagavaḥ prāṇādbhūya iti,
GSP33brssbh1u:2943: prāṇaviṣayameva cātivāditvāmuttaratrānukṛṣyamāṇaṃ paśyāmaḥ- 'eṣa tu vā ativadati yaḥ satyenātivadati' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2949: yathaiṣo 'gnihotrī yaḥ satyaṃ vadatītyukte na satyavadanenāgnihotritvaṃ,
GSP33brssbh1u:2952: tathā 'eṣa tu vā ativadati yaḥ satyenātivadati' ityukte na satyavadanenātivāditvam,
GSP33brssbh1u:2955: satyavadanaṃ tu prāṇavido viśeṣo vivakṣyata iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2958: śrutyā hyatra satyavadanenātivāditvaṃ pratīyate- 'yaḥsatyenātivadati so 'tivadati' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2962: prakṛtavyāvṛttyarthaśca tuśabdo na saṃgacchate 'eṣa tu vā ativadati' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2963: 'satyaṃ tveva vijijñāsitavyam' (chā. 7.16) iti ca prayatnāntarakaraṇamarthāntaravivakṣāṃ sūcayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2964: tasmādyathaikavedapraśaṃsāyāṃ prakṛtāyāmeṣa tu mahābrāhmaṇo yaścaturo vedānadhīta ityekavedebhyor'thāntarabhūtaścaturvedaḥ praśasyate tādṛgetaddraṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssbh1u:2967: tatra prāṇāntamanuśāsanaṃ śrutvā tūṣṇībhūtaṃ nāradaṃ svayameva sanatkumāro vyutpādayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2968: yatprāṇavijñānena vikārānṛtaviṣayeṇātivāditvamanativāditvameva tat 'eṣa tu vā ativadati yaḥ satyenātivadati' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2971: tathā vyutpāditāya nāradāya 'so 'haṃ bhagavaḥ satyenātivadāni' ityevaṃ pravṛttāya vijñānādisādhanaparamparayā bhūmānamupadiśati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2972: tatra yatprāṇādadhi satyaṃ vaktavyaṃ pratijñātaṃ tadeveha bhūmetyucyata iti gamyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:2973: tasmādasti prāṇādadhi bhūmna upadeśa ityataḥ prāṇādanyaḥ paramātmā bhūmā bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2980: iti copakramyopasaṃharati- 'tasmai mṛditakaṣāyāya tamasaḥ pāraṃ darśayati bhagavānsanatkumāraḥ' (chā. 7.26.2) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2984: prakaraṇānte paramātmavivakṣā bhaviṣyati, 'bhūmā tu prāṇa eveti cet' na /
GSP33brssbh1u:2997: apica ye bhūmni śrūyante dharmāste paramātmanyupapadyante /
GSP33brssbh1u:2998: 'yatra nānyatpaśyati nānyacchṛṇoti nānyadvajānāti sa bhūmā' iti darśanādivyavahārābhāvaṃ bhūmānyavagamayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:3001: yo 'pyasau suṣuptāvasthāyāṃ darśanādivyavahārābhāva uktaḥ so 'pyātmana evāsaṅgatvavivakṣayokto na prāṇasvabhāvavivakṣayā,
GSP33brssbh1u:3003: yadapi tasyāmavasthāyāṃ sukhamuktaṃ, tadapyātmana eva sukharūpatvavivakṣayoktam /
GSP33brssbh1u:3004: yata āha- 'eṣo 'sya parama ānanda etasyaivānandasyānyāni bhūtāni mātrāmupajīvanti' (bṛ. 4.3.32) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:3005: ihāpi 'yo vai bhūmā tatsukhaṃ nālpe sukhamasti bhūmaiva sukham' iti sāmayasukhanirākaraṇena brahmaiva sukhaṃ bhūmānaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:3006: 'yo vai bhūmā tadamṛtam' ityamṛtatvamapīha śrūyamāṇaṃ paramakāraṇaṃ gamayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:3008: tathāca satyatvaṃ svamahimapratiṣṭhitatvaṃ sarvagatatvaṃ sarvāttmatvamiti caite dharmāḥ śrūyamāṇāḥ paramātmanyevopapadyante nānyatra /
GSP33brssbh1u:3018: sa hovācaitadvai tadakṣaraṃ gārgi brāhmaṇā abhivadantyasthūlamanaṇu' (bṛ. 3.8.7,8)ityādi śrūyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:3019: tatra saṃśayaḥ- kimakṣaraśabdena varṇa ucyate kiṃvā parameśvara iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:3020: tatrākṣarasamāmnāya ityādāvakṣaraśabdasya varṇe prasiddhatvāt prasiddhyatikramasya cāyuktatvāt 'oṅkāra evedaṃ sarvam' (chā. 2.23.3)
GSP33brssbh1u:3026_0: tatra hi pṛthivyādeḥ samastavikārajātasya kālatrayavibhaktasya 'ākāśa eva tadotaṃ
GSP33brssbh1u:3026_1: ca protaṃ ca' ityākāśe pratiṣṭhitatvamuktvā 'kasminnu khalvākāśa otaśca protaśca'
GSP33brssbh1u:3027: tathācopasaṃhṛtam- 'etasminnu khalvakṣare gārgyākāśa otaśca protaśca' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:3029: yadapi 'oṅkāra evedaṃ sarvam' iti tadapi brahmapratipattisādhanatvātstutyarthaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssbh1u:3030: tasmānna kṣaratyaśnute ceti nityatvāvyāpitatvābhyāmakṣaraṃ parameva brahma // 10 //
GSP33brssbh1u:3042: praśāsanaṃ hīha śrūyate- 'etasya vā akṣarasya praśāsane gārgi sūryācandramasau vidhṛtau tiṣṭhataḥ' (bṛ. 3.8.9) ityādi /
GSP33brssbh1u:3045: na hyacetanānāṃ ghaṭādikāraṇānāṃ mṛdādīnāṃ ghaṭādiviṣayaṃ praśāsanamasti // 11 //
GSP33brssbh1u:3053_1: vyāvartayati śrutiḥ- 'tadvā etadakṣaraṃ gārgyadṛṣṭaṃ daṣṭraśrutaṃ śrotramataṃ mantravijñātaṃ
GSP33brssbh1u:3056: tathā 'nānyadato 'sti draṣṭṛ nānyadatosti śrotṛ nānyadato 'sti mantṛ nānyadato 'sti vijñātṛ' ityātmabhedapratiṣedhāt na śārīrasyāpyupādhimato 'kṣaraśabdavācyatvam /
GSP33brssbh1u:3063_1: iti prakṛtya śrūyate- 'yaḥ punaretaṃ trimātreṇomithyetenaivākṣareṇa paraṃ puruṣamabhidhyāyīta' (pra. 5.2,5) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:3068: 'sa tejasi sūrye saṃpannaḥ'' 'sa sāmabhirunnīyate brahmalokam' iti ca tadvido deśaparicchinnasya phalasyocyamānatvāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:3069: nahi parabrahmaviddeśaparicchinnaṃ phalamaśnuvīteti yuktam, sarvagatatvātparasya brahmaṇaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:3078: īkṣatikarmatvenāsyābhidhyātavyasya puruṣasya vākyaśeṣe vyapadeśo bhavati- 'sa etasmājjīvaghanātparātparaṃ puriśayaṃ puraṣamīkṣate' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:3081: īkṣatestu tathābhūtameva vastu loke karma dṛṣṭamityataḥ paramātmaivāyaṃ samyagdarśanaviṣayabhūta īkṣatikarmatvena vyadiṣṭa iti gamyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:3083: nanvabhidhyāne paraḥ puruṣa uktaḥ, īkṣaṇe tu parātparaḥ, kathamitara itaratra pratyabhijñāyata iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:3085: nacātra jīvanaghanaśabdena prakṛto 'bhidhyātavyaḥ paraḥ puruṣaḥ parāmṛśyate,
GSP33brssbh1u:3090: saindhavakhilyavadyaḥ paramātmano jīvarūpaḥ khilyabhāva upādhikṛtaḥ paraśca viṣayendriyebhyaḥ so 'tra jīvaghana iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:3091: apara āha- 'sa sāmabhirunnīyate brahmalokam' ityatītānantaravākyanirdiṣṭo yo brahmalokaḥ paraśca lokāntarebhyaḥ so 'trajīvaghana ityucyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:3092: jīvānāṃ hi sarveṣāṃ karaṇaparivṛtānāṃ sarvakaraṇātmani hiraṇyagarbhe brahmalokanivāsini saṃghātopapatterbhavati brahmaloko jīvaghanaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:3093: tasmātparo yaḥ paramātmekṣaṇakarmabhūtaḥ sa evābhidhyāne 'pi karmabhūta iti gamyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:3094: paraṃ puruṣamiti ca viśeṣaṇaṃ paramātmaparigraha evāvakalpate /
GSP33brssbh1u:3095: paro hi puruṣaḥ paramātmaiva bhavati yasmātparaṃ kiñcidanyannāsti,
GSP33brssbh1u:3096: 'puruṣānna paraṃ kiñcitsā kāṣṭhā sā parā gatiḥ' iti ca śrutyantarāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:3097: 'paraṃ cāparaṃ ca brahma yadoṅkāraḥ' iti ca vibhajyānantaramoṅkāreṇa paraṃ puruṣamabhidhyātavyaṃ bruvanparameva brahmaparaṃ puruṣaṃ gamayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:3098: 'yathā pādodarastvacā vinirmucyata evaṃ ha vai sa pāpmanā vinirmucyate' iti pāpmavinirmokaphalavacanaṃ paramātmānamihābhidhyātavyaṃ sūcayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:3099: atha yaduktaṃ paramātmābhidhyāyino na deśaparicchinnaphalaṃ yujyata iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:3100: atrocyate- trimātreṇoṅkāreṇālambanena paramātmānamabhidhyāyataḥ phalaṃ brahmalokaprāptiḥ krameṇa ca samyagdarśanotpattiriti kramamuktyabhiprāyametadbhaviṣyatītyadoṣaḥ // 13 //
GSP33brssbh1u:3102: FN: paraṃ nirviśeṣam, aparaṃ kāryaṃ, āyatanena prāptisādhanena, anveti prāpnoti /

GSP33brssbh1u:4485: sa evāyaṃ praśnaḥ punaranukṛṣyata iti yadyucyeta,
GSP33brssbh1u:4486: dvayorātmaviṣayayoḥ praśnayorekatāpatteragniviṣaya ātmaviṣayaśca dvāveva praśnāvityato na vaktavyaṃ trayāṇāṃ praśnopanyāsāviti /
GSP33brssbh1u:4487: athānyo 'yamapūrvaḥ praśnaḥ utthāpyata ityucyeta tato yathaiva varapradānavyatirekeṇa praśnakalpanāyāmadoṣa evaṃ praśna vyatirekeṇāpi pradhānopanyāsakalpanāyāmadoṣaḥ syāditi /
GSP33brssbh1u:4488: atrocyate- naivaṃ vayamiha varapradānavyatirekeṇa praśnaṃ kañcitkalpayāmo vākyopakramasāmarthyāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:4489: varapradānopakramā hi mṛtyunaciketaḥsaṃvādarūpā vākyapravṛttirāsamāpteḥ kaṭhavallīnāṃ lakṣyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:4490: mṛtyuḥ kila nāciketase pitrā prahitāya trīnvarānpradadau /
GSP33brssbh1u:4491: naciketāḥ kila teṣāṃ prathamena vareṇa saumanasyaṃ vavre /
GSP33brssbh1u:4495: tatra yadyanyatra dharmādityanyo 'yamapūrvaḥ praśna utthāpyeta tato varapradānavyatirekeṇāpi praśnakalpanādvākyaṃ bādhyetha /
GSP33brssbh1u:4498: yoyaṃ prete vicikitsā manuṣye 'sti nāstīti vicikitsābhidhānāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:4510: iha cānyatra dharmādityasya praśnasya prativacanaṃ 'na jāyate mriyate vā vipaścit' iti janmamaraṇapratiṣedhena pratipādyamānaṃ śārīraparameśvarayorabhedaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:4511: sati hi prasaṅge pratiṣedho bhāgī bhavati /
GSP33brssbh1u:4512: prasaṅgaśca janmamaraṇayoḥ śarīrasaṃsparśācchārīrasya bhavati na parameśvarasya /
GSP33brssbh1u:4514: mahāntaṃ vibhumātmānaṃ matvā dhīro na śocati //
GSP33brssbh1u:4516: iti svapnajāgaritadṛśo jīvasyaiva mahattvavibhutvaviśeṣaṇasya mananena śokavicchedaṃ darśayanna prājñādanyo jīva iti darśayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:4519: mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyumāpnoti ya iha nāneva paśyati /
GSP33brssbh1u:4521: tathā jīvavīṣayasyāstitvanāstitvapraśnasyānantaram 'anyaṃ varaṃ naciketo vṛṇīṣva' ityārabhya mṛtyunā taistaiḥ kāmaiḥ pralobhyamāno 'pi naciketā yadā na cacāla,
GSP33brssbh1u:4522: tadainaṃ mṛtyurabhyudayanīḥśreyasavibhāgapradarśanena vidyāvidyāvibhāgapradarśanena ca 'vidyābhīpsinaṃ naciketasaṃ manye na tvā kāmā bahavo 'lolupanta' (kā.1.2.4)
GSP33brssbh1u:4523: iti praśasya praśnamapi tadīyaṃ praśaṃsanyaduvāca- 'taṃ durdarśaṃ gūḍhamanupraviṣṭhaṃ guhāhitaṃ gahvareṣṭhaṃ purāṇam /
GSP33brssbh1u:4524: adhyātmayogādhigamena devaṃ matvā dhīro harṣaśokau jahāti //
GSP33brssbh1u:4525: ' (kā.1.2.12) iti, tenāpi jīvaprājñayorabheda eveha vivakṣata iti gamyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:4526: yatpraśnanimittāṃ ca praśaṃsāṃ mahatīṃ mṛtyoḥ pratyapadyata naciketā yadi taṃ vihāya praśaṃsānantaramanyameva praśnamupakṣipedasthāna eva sā sarvā praśaṃsā prasāritā syāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:4527: tasmāt 'yeyaṃ prete' ityasyaiva praśnasyaitadanukarṣaṇam 'anyatra dharmāt' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:4530_0: pūrvatra hi dehādivyatiriktasyātmano 'stitvaṃ pṛṣṭamuttaratra tu tasyaivāsaṃsāritvaṃ
GSP33brssbh1u:4530_1: pṛcchyata iti yāvaddhyavidyā na nivartate tāvaddharmādigocaratvaṃ jīvasya jīvatvaṃ ca na nivartate /
GSP33brssbh1u:4531: tannivṛttau tu prājña eva tattvamasīti śrutyā pratyāyyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:4533: yathā kaścitsaṃtamase patitāṃ kāñcidrajjumahiṃ manyamāno bhīto vepamānaḥ palāyate,
GSP33brssbh1u:4535: sa ca tadupaśrutyāhikṛtaṃ bhayamutsṛjedvepathuṃ palāyanaṃ ca /
GSP33brssbh1u:4536: natvahibuddhikāle tadapagamakāle ca vastunaḥ kaścidviśeṣaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:4538: tataśca 'na jāyate mriyate vā' ityevamādyapi bhavatyastitvapraśnasya prativacanam /
GSP33brssbh1u:4540: ekatve 'pi hyātmaviṣayasya praśnasya prāyaṇāvasthāyāṃ dehavyatiriktāstitvamātravicikitsānātkartṛtvādisaṃsārasvabhāvānapohanācca pūrvasya paryāyasya jīvaviṣayatvamutprekṣyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:4543: pradhānakalpanāyāṃ tu na varapradānaṃ na praśno na prativacanamiti vaiṣamyam // 6 //
GSP33brssbh1u:4545: FN: mṛtyunā naciketasaṃprati trīnvarānavṛṇīṣvetyuktestrayāṇāmeva praśno naciketasā kṛtaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:4547: he mṛtyo, sa mahyaṃ dattavarastvaṃ svargahetumagnimadhyeṣi smarasi /
GSP33brssbh1u:4549: dehādanyo 'sti naveti saṃśayo.'sti ata etadātmatattvamasaṃdigdhaṃ jānīyāmityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:4556: yena sākṣiṇā pramātā paśyati tamātmānamiti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:4562: yathā mahacchabdaḥ sāṃkhyaiḥ sattāmātre 'pi prathamaje prayukte na tameva vaidike 'pi prayoge 'bhidhatte /
GSP33brssbh1u:4574: mantravarṇāt- 'ajāmekāṃ lohitaśuklakṛṣṇāṃ bahvīḥ prajāḥ sṛjamānāṃ sarūpāḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:4575: ajo hyeko juṣamāṇo 'nuśete jahātyenāṃ bhuktabhogāmajo 'nyaḥ' (śve. 4.5) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:4581: na jāyata iti cājā syāt, 'mūlaprakṛtiravikṛtiḥ' ityabhyupagamāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:4584: sā tu rūḍhiriha nāśrayituṃ śakyā, vidyāprakaraṇāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:4586: tāṃ prakṛtimaja ekaḥ puruṣo juṣamāṇaḥ prīyamāṇaḥ sevamāno vānuśete /
GSP33brssbh1u:4588: anyaḥ punarajaḥ puruṣe utpannavivekajñāno virakto jahātyenāṃ prakṛtiṃ bhuktabhogāṃ kṛtabhogāpavargāṃ parityajati /
GSP33brssbh1u:4591: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - nānena mantreṇa śrutimattva sāṃkhyavādasya śakyamāśrayitum /
GSP33brssbh1u:4592: nahyayaṃ mantraḥ svātantryeṇa kañcidapi vādaṃ samarthayitumutsahate /
GSP33brssbh1u:4597: ityasminamantre svātantryeṇāyaṃ nāmāsau camaso 'bhipreta iti na śakyate nirūpayitum /
GSP33brssbh1u:4601: tatra tu 'idaṃ tacchira eṣa hyarvāgbilaścamasa ūrdhvabudhnaḥ' iti vākyaśeṣāccamasaviśeṣapratipattirbhavati /
GSP33brssbh1u:4606_0: ajāmekāṃ- na jāyata ityajā tāṃ mulaprakṛtiṃ lohitaśuklakṛṣṇāṃ rajaḥsatvamoguṇāṃ sarūpāstriguṇātmikāḥ
GSP33brssbh1u:4606_1: prajā janayantīṃ eko 'jo jīvastāṃ śabdādiviṣayarūpatāpannāṃ juṣamāṇaḥ sannanuśete
GSP33brssbh1u:4607: jīvena bhukto bhogo yasyāṃ yasyā vā tāṃ jīvena bhujyamānāmanyaḥ paramātmā jahāti nāsyāmāsaktiṃ karoti /
GSP33brssbh1u:4608: avayavāḥ pradhānasya raja ādayasteṣāṃ dharmā rañjakatvādayastaiḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:4615: jyotirupakramā tu tathā hy adhīyata eke | BBs_1,4.9 |
GSP33brssbh1u:4616: parameśvarādutpannā jyotiḥpramukhā tejobannalakṣaṇā caturvidhasya bhūtagrāmasya prakṛtibhūteyamajā pratipattavyā /
GSP33brssbh1u:4620: tathāhyeke śākhinastejobannānāṃ parameśvarādutpattimāmnāya teṣāmeva rohitādirūpatāmāmananti- 'yadagre rohitaṃ rūpaṃ tejastadrūpaṃ yacchukraṃ tadapāṃ yatkṛṣṇaṃ tadannasya' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:4622: rohitādīnāṃ ca śabdānāṃ rūpaviśeṣeṣu mukhyatvādbhāktatvācca guṇaviṣayatvasya /
GSP33brssbh1u:4623: asaṃdigdhena ca saṃdigdhasya nigamanaṃ nyāyyaṃ manyante /
GSP33brssbh1u:4628: vākyaśeṣe 'pi 'māyāṃ tu prakṛti vidyānmāyinaṃ tu maheśvaram' iti 'yo yoniṃ yonimadhitiṣṭhatyekaḥ' (śve. 4.10,11)
GSP33brssbh1u:4629: iti ca tasyā evāvagamānna svatantrā kācitprakṛtiḥ pradhānaṃ nāmajāmantreṇāmnāyata iti śakyate vaktum /
GSP33brssbh1u:4630: prakaraṇāttu saiva daivī śaktiravyākṛtanāmarūpā nāmarūpayoḥ prāgavasthānenāpi mantreṇāmnāyata ityucyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:4632: kathaṃ punastejobannātmanā trairūpyeṇa trirūpājā pratipattuṃ śakyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:4638: te brahmavādino 'nayā rītyā vimṛśya dyānayogenānugatāḥ paramātmānamanu praviṣṭāḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:4639: avidyāśaktiryoniḥ sā ca pratijīvaṃ nānetyuktamato vīpsopapannā /
GSP33brssbh1u:4646: yathāhi loke yadṛcchayā kācidajā rohitaśuklakṛṣṇaṇavarṇā syādbahubarkarā sarūpabarkarā ca tāṃ ca kaścidajo juṣamāṇo 'nuśayīta,
GSP33brssbh1u:4648: evamiyamapi tejobannalakṣaṇā bhūtaprakṛtistrivarṇā bahu sarūpaṃ carācaralakṣaṇaṃ vikārajātaṃ janayati aviduṣā ca kṣetrajñenopabhujyate viduṣā ta parityajata iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:4649: nacedamāśaṅkitavyamekaḥ kṣetrajño 'nuśete 'nyo jahātītyataḥ kṣetrajñabhedaḥ pāramārthikaḥ pareṣāmiṣṭaḥ prāpnotīti /
GSP33brssbh1u:4653: 'eko devaḥ sarvabhūteṣu gūḍhaḥ sarvavyāpī sarvabhūtāntarātmā' ityādiśrutibhyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:4658: ityevañjātīyakaṃ kalpyate, evamidamanajāyā ajātvaṃ kalpyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:4665: na saṃkhyopasaṃgrahādapi nānābhāvād atirekāc ca | BBs_1,4.11 |
GSP33brssbh1u:4669: asminmantre pañca pañcajanā iti pañcasaṃkhyāviṣayāparā pañcasaṃkhyā śrūyate pañcadvayaśabdadarśanāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:4671: tathā pañcaviṃśatisaṃkhyayā yāvantaḥ saṃkhyeyā ākāṅkṣyantelatāvantyeva ca tattvāni sāṃkhyaiḥ saṃkhyāyante- 'mūlaprakṛtiravikṛtirmahadādyāḥ prakṛtivikṛtayaḥ sapta /
GSP33brssbh1u:4672: ṣoḍaśakaśca vikāro na prakṛtirna vikṛtiḥ puruṣaḥ' (sāṃkhyakā. 3) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:4673: tayā śrutiprasiddhayā pañcaviṃśatisaṃkhyayā teṣāṃ smṛtiprasiddhānāṃ pañcaviṃśatitattvānāmupasaṃgrahātprāptaṃ punaḥ śrutimattvameva pradhānādīnām /
GSP33brssbh1u:4674: tato brūmaḥ - na saṃkhyopasaṃgrahādapi pradhānādīnāṃ śrutimattvaṃ pratyāśā kartavyā /
GSP33brssbh1u:4679: yena pañcaviṃśaterantarāle parāḥ pañca pañcasaṃkhyā niveśeran /
GSP33brssbh1u:4682: yathā 'pañca sapta ca varṣāṇi na vavarṣa śatakratuḥ' iti dvādaśavārṣikīmanāvṛṣṭiṃ kathayanti tadvaditi /
GSP33brssbh1u:4685: paraścātra pañcaśabdo janaśabdena samastaḥ pañcajanā iti, pāribhāṣikeṇa svareṇaikapadatvaniścayāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:4690: naca pañcasaṃkhyāyā ekasyāḥ pañcasaṃkhyayā parayā viśeṣaṇaṃ pañca pañcakā iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:4692: nanvāpannapañcasaṃkhyakā janā eva punaḥ pañcasaṃkhyayā viśeṣyamāṇāḥ pañcaviṃśatiḥ pratyeṣyante /
GSP33brssbh1u:4693: yathā pañca pañcapūlya iti pañcavaṃśatipūlāḥ pratīyante tadvat /
GSP33brssbh1u:4695: yuktaṃ yatpañcapūlīśabdasya samāhārābhiprāyatvātkatīti satyāṃ bhedākāṅkṣāyāṃ pañca pañcapūlya iti viśeṣaṇam /
GSP33brssbh1u:4696: iha tu pañca pañca janā ityādita eva bhedopādānātkatītyasatyāṃ bhedākāṅkṣāyāṃ na pañca pañcajanā iti viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavet /
GSP33brssbh1u:4697: bhavadapīdaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ pañcasaṃkhyāyā eva bhavet, tatra cokto doṣaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:4705: sa ca pañcaviṃśatāvantargata eveti na tasyaivādhāratvamādheyatvaṃ ca yujyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:4707: tathā 'ākāśaśca pratiṣṭhitaḥ' ityākāśasyāpi pañcaviṃśatavantargatasya na pṛthagupādānaṃ nyāyyam /
GSP33brssbh1u:4709: kathaṃ ca saṃkhyāmātraśravaṇe satyaśrutānāṃ pañcaviṃśatitattvānāmupasaṃgrahaḥ pratīyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:4714: iti viśeṣaṇasmaraṇātsaṃjñāyāmeva pañcaśabdasya janaśabdena samāsaḥ tataśca rūḍhatvābhiprāyeṇaiva kecitpañcajanā nāma vivakṣyante na sāṃkhyatattvābhiprāyeṇa /
GSP33brssbh1u:4716: pañcajanā nāma ye kecitte ca pañcaivetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:4733_1: pañca nirdiṣṭāḥ - 'prāṇasya prāṇamuta cakṣuṣaścakṣuruta śrotrasya śrotramannasyānnaṃ
GSP33brssbh1u:4737: samāne tu prasiddhyatikrame vākyaśeṣavaśātprāṇādaya eva gpahītavyā bhavanti /
GSP33brssbh1u:4739: janavacanaśca puruṣaśabdaḥ prāṇeṣu prayuktaḥ 'te vā ete pañca brahmapuruṣāḥ' (chā. 3.13.6) ityatra /
GSP33brssbh1u:4740: 'prāṇo ha pitā prāṇo ha mātā' (chā.7.15.1) ityādi ca brāhmaṇam /
GSP33brssbh1u:4744: prasiddhārthasaṃnidhāne hyaprasiddhārthaḥ śabdaḥ prayujyamānaḥ samabhivyāhārāttadviṣayo niyamyate,
GSP33brssbh1u:4746: tathāyamapi pañcajanaśabdaḥ samāsānvākhyānādavagatasaṃjñābhāvaḥ saṃjñyākāṅkṣī vākyaśeṣasamabhivyāhṛteṣu prāṇādiṣu vartiṣyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:4747: kaiścittu devāḥ pitaro gandharvā asurā rakṣāṃsi ca pañca pañcajanā vyākhyātāḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:4749: kvacicca 'yatpāñcajanyayā viśā' (ṛ.saṃ. 8.53.7) iti prajāparaḥ prayogaḥ pañcajanaśabdasya dṛśyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:4751: ācāryastu na pañcaviśatestattvānamiha pratītirastītyevaṃparatayā 'prāṇādayo vākyaśeṣāt' iti jagāda // 12 //
GSP33brssbh1u:4753: kāṇvānāṃ tu kathaṃ prāṇādayaḥ pañcajanā bhaveyurye 'nnaṃ prāṇādiṣu nāmanantīti /
GSP33brssbh1u:4757: ye prāṇādiprerakaṃ tatsākṣiṇamātmānaṃ viduste brahmavida ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:4758: janavācakaḥ śabdo janaśabdaḥ pañcajanaśabda iti yāvat /
GSP33brssbh1u:4762: asatyapi kāṇvānāmanne jyotiṣā teṣāṃ pañcasaṃkhyā pūryeta /
GSP33brssbh1u:4763: te 'pi hi 'yasminpañca pañcajanāḥ ityataḥ pūrvasminmantre brahmasvarūpanirūpaṇāyaiva jyotiradhīyate- 'taddevā jyotiṣāṃ jyotiḥ' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:4764: kathaṃ punarubhayeṣāmapi tulyavadidaṃ jyotiḥ paṭhyamānaṃ samānamantragatayā pañcasaṃkhyayā keṣāñcidgrṛhyate keṣāñcinneti /
GSP33brssbh1u:4780: tatredamaparamāśaṅkate- na janmādikaraṇatvaṃ brahmaṇo brahmaviṣayaṃ vā gatisāmānyaṃ vedāntavākyānāṃ pratipattuṃ śakyam /
GSP33brssbh1u:4789: tathā kvacidasatpūrvikā sṛṣṭiḥ paṭhyate- 'asadvā idamagra āsīttato vai sadājayata' (tai. 2.7) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:4791_1: āsīt' ityupakramya 'kutastu khalu somyaivaṃ syāditi hovāca kathamasataḥ sajjāyeteti
GSP33brssbh1u:4792: kvacitsvayaṅkartṛkaiva vyākriyā jagato nigadyate- 'taddhedaṃ tarhyavyākṛtamāsīttannāmarūpābhyāmeva vyākriyata' (bṛ. 1.4.7) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:4793: evamanekadhā vipratipattirvastuni ca vikalpasyānupapatterna vedāntavākyānāṃ jagatkāraṇāvadhāraṇaparatā nyāyyā /
GSP33brssbh1u:4795: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - satyapi prativedāntaṃ sṛjyamāneṣvākāśādiṣu kramādidvārake vigāne na sraṣṭari kiñcidvigānamasti /
GSP33brssbh1u:4798: yathābhūto hyekasminvedānte sarvajñaḥ sarveśvaraḥ sarvātmaiko 'dvitīyaḥ kāraṇatvena vyapadiṣṭastathābhūta eva vedāntāntareṣvapi vyapadiśyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:4800: atra tāvajjñānaśabdena pareṇa ca tadviṣayeṇa kāmayitṛtvavacanena cetanaṃ brahma nyarūpayadaparaprayojyatveneśvaraṃ kāraṇamabravīt /
GSP33brssbh1u:4801: tadviṣayeṇaiva pareṇātmaśabdena śarīrādikośaparaṃparayā cāntaranupraveśanena sarveṣāmantaḥ pratyagātmānaṃ niradhārayat /
GSP33brssbh1u:4803: iti cātmaviṣayeṇa bahubhavanānuśaṃsanena sṛjyamānānāṃ vikārāṇāṃ sraṣṭurabhedamabhāṣata /
GSP33brssbh1u:4806: tadatra yallakṣaṇaṃ brahma kāraṇatvena vijñātaṃ tallakṣaṇamevānyatrāpi vijñāyate- 'sadeva semyedamagra āsīdekamevādvitīyam' 'tadaikṣata bahu syāṃ prajāyeyeti /
GSP33brssbh1u:4808: tathā 'ātmā vā idameka evāgra āsīnnānyakiñcana miṣat /

GSP33brssbh1u:5110: sthite ca kṣetrajñaparamātmaikatvaviṣaya samyagdarśane kṣetrajñaḥ paramātmeti nāmamātrabhaidāt,
GSP33brssbh1u:5111: kṣetrajño 'yaṃ paramātmano bhinnaḥ paramātmāyaṃ kṣetrajñādbhinna ityevañjātīyaka ātmabhaidaviṣayo nirbandho nirarthakaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:5114: yo veda nihitaṃ guhāyām' (tai. 2.1) iti kāñcidevaikāṃ guhāmadhikṛtyaitaduktam /
GSP33brssbh1u:5117: ye tu nirbandhaṃ kurvanti te vedāntārthaṃ bādhamānāḥ śreyodvāraṃ samyagdarśanameva bādhante /
GSP33brssbh1u:5123: vicitya nirmāya teṣāṃ nāmāni kṛtvā tatrānupraviśyābhivadannabhivadanādi kurvan /
GSP33brssbh1u:5133: tacca lakṣaṇaṃ ghaṭarucakādīnāṃ mṛtsuvarṇādivatprakṛtitve kulālasuvarṇakārādivannimittatve ca samānamityato bhavati vimarśaḥ,
GSP33brssbh1u:5140: īkṣāpūrvakaṃ ca kartṛtvaṃ nimittakāraṇeṣveva kulālādiṣu dṛṣṭam /
GSP33brssbh1u:5142: sa ca nyāya ādikartaryapi yuktaḥ saṃkramayitum /
GSP33brssbh1u:5144: īśvarāṇāṃ hi rājavaivasvatādīnāṃ nimittakāraṇatvameva kevalaṃ pratīyate tadvatparameśvarasyāpi nimittakāraṇatvameva yuktaṃ pratipattum /
GSP33brssbh1u:5148: brahma ca naivaṃlakṣaṇamavagamyate 'niṣkalaṃ niṣkriyaṃ śāntaṃ niravadyaṃ nirañjanam' (śve. 6.19) ityādiśrutibhyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:5151: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ prakṛtiścopādānakāraṇaṃ ca brahmābhyupagantavyaṃ nimittakāraṇaṃ ca /
GSP33brssbh1u:5156: pratijñā tāvat- 'uta tamādeśamaprākṣyo yenāśrutaṃ śrutaṃ bhavatyamataṃ matamavijñātaṃ vijñātam' (chā. 6.1.2) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:5157: tatra caikena vijñātena sarvamandavijñātamapi vijñātaṃ bhavatīti pratīyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:5159: nimittakāraṇāvyatirekāstu kāryasya nāsti, loke takṣṇaḥ prāsādavyatirekadarśanāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:5160: dṛṣṭānto 'pi yathā 'somyaikena mṛtpiṇḍena sarvaṃ mṛnmayaṃ vijñātaṃ syādvācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyaṃ mṛttiketyeva satyam' ityupādānakāraṇagocara evamāmnāyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:5161: tathā 'ekena lohamaṇinā sarvaṃ lohamayaṃ vijñātaṃ syāt' 'ekena nakhanikṛntanena sarvaṃ kārṣṇāyasaṃ vijñātaṃ syāt' (chā. 6.1.4,5,6) iti ca /
GSP33brssbh1u:5162: tathānyatrāpi 'kasminnu bhagavo vijñāte sarvamidaṃ vijñātaṃ bhavati (muṇḍa. 1.1.2) iti pratijñā /
GSP33brssbh1u:5164: tathā 'ātmani kalvare dṛṣṭe śrute mate vijñāta idaṃ sarvaṃ viditam' iti pratijñā /
GSP33brssbh1u:5165: 'sa yathā dundubherhanyamānasya na bāhyāñśabdāñśaknuyādgrahaṇāya dundubhestu grahaṇena dundubhyāghātasya vā śabdo gṛhītaḥ' (bṛ. 4.5.6,7) iti dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:5166: evaṃ yathāsaṃbhavaṃ prativedāntaṃ pratijñādṛṣṭāntau prakṛtitvasādhanau pratyetavyau /
GSP33brssbh1u:5167: yata itīyaṃ pañcamī 'yato vā imāni bhūtāni jāyante' ityatra 'janikartuḥ prakṛtiḥ' (pā.sū. 1.4.30)
GSP33brssbh1u:5170: yathā hi loke mṛtsuvarṇādikamupādānakāraṇaṃ kulālasuvarṇakārādīnadhiṣṭhātṛnapekṣya pravartate naivaṃ brahmaṇa upādānakāraṇasya sato 'nyo 'dhiṣṭhātāpekṣyo 'sti,
GSP33brssbh1u:5178: niṣkalaṃ niravayavam, niṣkriyamacalam, śāntamapariṇāmi, niravadyaṃ nirastasamastadoṣam /
GSP33brssbh1u:5181: dundubhyāghātasya janakasya janyatayā saṃbandhī vā śabdo viśeṣaśabda ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:5184: abhidhyopadeśaścātmanaḥ kartṛtvaprakṛtitve gamayati 'so 'kāmayata bahu syāṃ prajāyeyeti' 'tadaikṣata bahu syāṃ prajāyeya' iti ca /
GSP33brssbh1u:5193: yatkāraṇaṃ sākṣādbrahmaiva kāraṇamupādāyobhau prabhavapralayāvāmnāyate- 'sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtānyākāśādeva samutpadyante /
GSP33brssbh1u:5195: yaddhi yasmātprabhavati yasmiṃśca pralīyate tattasyopādānaṃ prasiddham /
GSP33brssbh1u:5206: kathaṃ punaḥ pūrvasiddhasya sataḥ kartṛtvena vyavasthitasya kriyamāṇatvaṃ śakyaṃ saṃpādayitum /
GSP33brssbh1u:5208: pūrvasiddho 'pi hi sannātmā viśeṣeṇa vikārātmanā pariṇamayāmāsātmānamiti /
GSP33brssbh1u:5213: yatkāraṇaṃ brahmaṇa eva vikārātmanā pariṇāmaḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyenāmnāyate 'sacca tyaccābhavat /
GSP33brssbh1u:5222: itaśca prakṛtirbrahma yonirityapi paṭhyate vedānteṣu 'kartāramīśaṃ puruṣaṃ brahmayonim' (muṇḍa. 3.1.3)
GSP33brssbh1u:5224: yoniśabdaśca prakṛtivacanaḥ samadhigato loke 'pṛthivī yoniroṣadhivanaspatīnām' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:5226: kacitsthānavacano 'pi yoniśabdo dṛṣṭaḥ - 'yoniṣṭa indra niṣade akāri' (ṛ.saṃ. 1.104.1) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:5227: vākyaśeṣāttvatra prakṛtivacanatā parigṛhyate 'yathorṇanābhiḥ sṛjate gṛhyate ca' (muṇḍa. 1.1.7) ityevañjātīyakāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:5229: yatpunaridamuktamīkṣāpūrvakaṃ kartṛtvaṃ nimittakāraṇeṣveva kulālādiṣu loke dṛṣṭaṃ nopādāneṣvityādi,
GSP33brssbh1u:5236: FN: kartāraṃ kriyāśaktimantam, īśaṃ niyantāram, puruṣaṃ pratyañcam, brahma pūrṇam, yoniṃ prakṛtim /
GSP33brssbh1u:5237: he indra, te tava niṣade upaveśanāya yoniḥ sthānaṃ mayā akāri kṛtam /
GSP33brssbh1u:5242: ityārabhya pradhānakāraṇavādaḥ sūtraireva punaḥ punarāśaṅkya nirākṛtaḥ,
GSP33brssbh1u:5243: tasya hi pakṣasyopodbalakāni kānicilliṅgābhāsāni vedānteṣvāpātena mandamatīnpratibhāntīti /
GSP33brssbh1u:5249: ataḥ pradhānamallanibarhaṇanyāyenātidiśati- etena pradhānakāraṇavādapratiṣedhanyāyakalāpena sarve 'ṇvādikāraṇavādā api pratiṣiddhatayā vyākhyātā veditavyāḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:5253: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīmacchaṅkarabhagavatpūjyapādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsābhāṣye prathamādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ samāptaḥ // 4 //
